job.title: Software Engineer
job.description: pstrongThe problemstrongppbrppEvery year billions of dollars are set aside by your local state and federal representatives to make it easier for anybody to build a small business and turn their dream into realityppbrppBut while governments might be great at governing theyre terrible at marketing These billions sit unclaimed waiting for founders to discover them We want to fix that and we need your helpppbrppstrongThe opportunitystrongppbrppMainStreet is looking for a Software Engineer to help us build out and influence the design for our front end web properties Youll have an opportunity to lead design and development of new features on top of the current onboarding and company portal helping us to structure our components in a reusable manner Additionally you will work closely with the design team to balance launch timelines and product perfection  we ship often so you wont have to wait weeks to see your work in productionppbrppstrongWhat youll dostrongppbrpulliBe a core member of a multidisciplinary team Engineering Product and Design focused on shipping impactful products and features for our customersnbspliliBuild clean well tested high quality front end and back end codeliliBorrow from your experience to help us uplevel our teams technology and processes as we scale and iterate rapidlyliliBe a steward of core security and design principlesliulpbrppstrongWhat were looking forstrongppbrpulli2 years experience building and maintaining production software in a full stack roleliliExperience optimizing React in production systems for performance and developer experienceliliSomeone who can own and drive technical decisions with a grounding in solving problems for our customers and businessliliExperience working with backend services and APIsliliSomeone that thrives in a highly collaborative and fast paced environmentliliExperience operating cross functionally with Engineering Product and Design teamsliliA willingness to learn on the job and take on tasks as neededliliExcellent communication skillsliliAbility to work independently and communicate over the phone and with video chat software such as ZoomliliBonus if you havenbspUsed Express andor Typescript in production systemExperience hosting and monitoring a production React ApplicationPassion for startups finance accounting and taxes or all of the aboveExperience using a state management such as Context  MobX  ReduxliulpbrppstrongCompensationstrongppstrongspan classqlcursorspanstrongpp Base salary range for this position is 100000  185000 and is based upon years of experience that is commensurate with the level of the position in addition to locationpp Bonus that is commensurate with the level of the positionpp Robust equity program with significant upside potentialpp Benefits including medical dental vision disability life 401k plus additional perks to make your work from home life betterppbrppstrongAbout MainStreetstrongppbrppemWhat we doemppbrppWe make these tax credits easy as butter MainStreet pairs companies amp employees with hundreds of local state and federal tax programs Then we do all the paperwork to get companies what theyre owed in minutes vs the dozens of hours it would otherwise takeppbrppThe average company gets 51040 in the first year In cashnbspppbrppWe justnbspannounced our 60M Series A led by SignalFire Were backed by an incredible community of partners operators and founders including Ryan Hoover Product Hunt founder Ashton Kutchers Sound Ventures Des Traynor Intercom cofounder Gradient a Google Venture Fund Ron Conways fund SV Angel and Tusk VenturesnbspppbrppemHow we think about diversityemppbrppWe try to make sure the diversity of our customers is reflected in the team that serves them Because when we include people of all races genders sexual orientations ages and identities  we end up building a better experience for everyone who uses MainStreetppbrpulliWe know we need to be intentional in our hiring practices in order to overcome systemic biases we may be blind to So if your lived experience has given you a unique perspective on business startups or any other aspect of our business  even if you dont meet all the requirements  please still apply and let us know so we can make sure your application gets the attention it deservesliul
